scripts.install:lib: cd lib && npm install && tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.install:microservices: cd microservices/lib && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.install:auth: cd microservices/src/auth && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.install:beacon: cd microservices/src/beacon && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.install:client: cd microservices/src/client && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.install:content: cd microservices/src/content && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.install:logger: cd microservices/src/logger && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.install:webserver: cd microservices/src/webserver && npm install && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp package.json dist/
scripts.clear:all: npm run clear:modules && npm run clear:dist && npm run clear:package-lock
